definition.script:
stage "This is stage 1" println "first comment" echo "Second comment" String ip = "ip addr show eth0".execute().getText().split('inet ')[1].split('/24 brd')[0] echo "Im running in this ip: ${ip}"
node('demo'){ String ip2 = "ip addr show eth0".execute().getText().split('inet ')[1].split('/24 brd')[0] echo "Im running in this ip: ${ip2}" sh 'rm -rf devstack-lxc' git 'https://github.com/osic/devstack-lxc.git' }
